title: Bug 7752 - Export multiple files with same file name under different directories to zip file fails.
description:
Steps to reproduce:
1. Launch WSWB and create two projects
2. Under each project, create a new file with the same name (such as "foo.txt")
3. From the main menu, select File > Export and select Zip File to export
4.
OB: When exporting multiple files with the same name under different directories to a zip file, the export process fails.
EB: The export process should successfully create a zip file containing all the files with the same name, preserving their original directory structure.
SR:
Follow these steps to reproduce the issue:
1. Launch WSWB and create two projects
2. Under each project, create a new file with the same name (such as "foo.txt")
3. From the main menu, select File > Export and select Zip File to export
